src:
Gempa M 4,3 Terjadi di Tanggamus Lampung
07 Nov 2019, 00:05 by Dwi Andayani
Jakarta - Gempa bermagnitudo 4,3 terjadi di Kabupaten Tanggamus, Lampung. Gempa terjadi di laut.
Dilihat dari situs resmi BMKG, Rabu (6/11/2019), gempa tersebut terjadi sekitar pukul 23.05 WIB.
"Pusat gempa berada di laut 78 Km Barat Daya Tanggamus," tulis BMKG.
Gempa terjadi pada kedalaman 19 km. Pusat gempa berada pada koordinat 6,07 Lintang Selatan dan 104,29 Bujur Timur.
Gempa dirasakan dengan skala MMI (Modified Mercalli Intensity) I-II di Liwa. Atau yang berarti getaran tidak dirasakan kecuali dalam keadaan luarbiasa oleh beberapa orang dan getaran dirasakan oleh beberapa orang, benda-benda ringan yang digantung bergoyang.
Belum ada informasi ada-tidaknya kerusakan akibat getaran gempa tersebut.




(dwia/fdu)
text:
4.3 M earthquake occurred at Tanggamus Lampung
Nov 7 2019, 00:05 by Dwi Andayani
Jakarta - An earthquake with a magnitude of 4.3 occurred in Tanggamus Regency, Lampung. The earthquake occurred at sea.
Judging from the official website of BMKG, Wednesday (11/06/2019), the earthquake occurred around 23.05 WIB.
"The epicenter was in the sea 78 Km Southwest Tanggamus," wrote BMKG.
The earthquake occurred at a depth of 19 km. The epicenter was at coordinates 6.07 South Latitude and 104.29 East Longitude.
The earthquake was felt with the scale of MMI (Modified Mercalli Intensity) I-II in Liwa. Or which means that vibrations are not felt except in extraordinary circumstances by some people and vibrations are felt by some people, light objects that are hung swaying.
There is no information yet whether there is damage due to the earthquake vibration.




(dwia / fdu)
